extension.description: This plugin allows you to unlock and edit the hidden advanced system settings of Kodi. Please note that Kodi restart is required so that the advanced settings become in effect.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin was created just fo fun and has no relation to official Kodi software. PLease use at your own risk. Author bears no liability for any changes made by this plugin in your system.
extension.description: Это дополнение Kodi позволяет Вам просматривать и редактировать расширенные настройки Kodi, скрытые от обычных пользователей. После редактирования требуется перезагрузить Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: Это дополнение Kodi разработано просто ради развлечения и не относится к официальному ПО Kodi. Испольуйте на свой собственный риск. Автор не несёт отвественности за любые изменения, произведённые при помоши данного плагина в Вашей системе.

extension.summary: Ace 2, improved, more light and more powerful than ever.
Ace 2, improved, more light and more powerful than ever.
Ace 2, melhorada, mais leve e mais poderosa do que nunca.
extension.description: The Ace reaches its second edition.[CR]Reformulated, very simple to use, with a new code that provides a lightweight and powerful skin.[CR]The Ace 2 incorporates new features such as Flexible Widgets 3nd Generation which takes the main menu's level of customization to something never seen before.[CR]Ace 2, you've never seen a skin like this.

A Ace 2 chega a sua segunda edição.[CR]Reformulada, muito simples de usar, com um novo código que proporciona uma pele leve e poderosa.[CR]Ace 2 incorpora um novo recurso chamado Widgets Flexíveis de Terceira Geração que eleva o nível de customização como você nunca viu antes.[CR]Ace 2, você nunca viu uma skin assim.
extension.disclaimer: Ace 2, improved, more light and more powerful than ever.
Ace 2, improved, more light and more powerful than ever.
Ace 2, melhorada, mais leve e mais poderosa do que nunca.
